title: Team-Based Hybrid Science Education Design: Applying Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Scientific Theories and Experimental Methodologies
context.additional_context: Science education design integrating team collaboration and self-directed learning in a hybrid classroom setting utilizing personal devices

learning_goals: Students apply critical thinking with over 80% accuracy when solving scientific problems
Learners initiate interactions with peers and instructors at least three times per week during team activities
Maintaining over 90% participation in individual mobile learning activities demonstrates self-directed learning competency
In team-based assignments, learners demonstrate problem-solving skills improved by over 30% compared to individual performance
Through team dynamics reflection during the learning process, learners acquire at least three conflict management strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
